alert.note: Alert for Russell; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Russell and west central Washington Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Cleveland Va, or 10 miles west of Lebanon, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hansonville, Castlewood and Holston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
